title: What Is ADA? A Brief History of the Proof-of-Stake Blockchain Network Cardano
description: On October 6, 2023, the cryptocurrency Cardano, known by its ticker ADA, is ranked as the eighth-largest in market capitalization, valued at just over $9 billion, or 0.817% of the $1.08 trillion cryptocurrency market. As the digital currency landscape evolves, ADA has emerged as a key contender. This article delves into Cardano’s origins, its native […]

title: Controversy Surrounding Video Game Character Designs
description: In recent years, video game character designs have been at the center of controversy, with some gamers expressing dissatisfaction over the appearance of their beloved protagonists. title: Komainu receives FCA approval for crypto custody services in the UK
description: London, UK – In a significant development for the cryptocurrency industry, Komainu, a leading cryptocurrency custody firm, has received approval from the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) to operate as a custodian wallet provider. This regulatory milestone not only bolsters Komainu’s presence in the UK but also aligns its operations with important anti-money laundering and ... Read more
